song.title: Sundrops and Rainshine
song.info:
Ranked 3rd in the newschool executable music compo at Revision 2013.
[b][i]Sunspire's comments:[/i][/b]
*Sundrops And Rainshine* (32k.exe)
Written for the Revision 2013 Executable Music Compo
Synth: Quiver by Revival / Fnuque (www.straightarrow.dk)
14 instruments, one synth, 31 kilobytes! All instruments created from scratch, pushing Quiver to its very limits. Greetings to all fellow demosceners. Special greetings to Revival and Punqtured of Fnuque and everyone at Revision!
..:: P L A Y I T L O U D ! ! ! ::..
